articles.author: Andrea Adelson
articles.title: ACC mulls 3-5-5 college football scheduling model in an effort to scrap divisions
articles.description: ACC commissioner Jim Phillips and multiple ADs discussed a 3-5-5 conference scheduling model for football, where league teams would play three permanent opponents, then rotate through the rest over a two-year period (five one year, five the next).
